text: Ksenia Penkina is an Instagram Influencer known for her artistic and technical desserts. She is based in Vancouver, Canada. == Biography == Penkina was born in Russia and received her education in Switzerland, where she was introduced to pastry. Known as the "Glazing Queen", Penkina first started to receive recognition for her desserts on social media in 2015, leading her to develop an online class. Penkina commits herself to teaching and expanding her worldwide Student Network through her extensive and technical Online Master Classes and Courses. == References == Category:1989 births Category:Pastry chefs Category:Living people
title: Ksenia Penkina
